Package it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EJBTestInjector  
    EventManager
    This class provide all methods related to handle the user's events
    EventManagerTestArquillian  
    PathManager
    This class provide all methods related to handle the path computation
    PeriodicEventsExecutor
    This Stateful Enterprise Java Bean is to be used to propagate the periodic events within an year
    PeriodicEventsPropagator
    This Singleton Enterprise Java Bean manage the propagation of periodic events in the time, it provide a thread pool to propagate the events for the first year ( due to heavy work ) and every day checks if an event is propagated within the year, if not he propagate it.
    PreferenceManager
    This class provide all methods related to handle the user preferences
    ScheduleManager  
    UserManager
    This is a generic manager class, to be extended by all managers in order to receive an injected user
